overview: These girls are young. They should be having sex with guys their own age, but 18-year-old boys are immature and cum way too fast. So they turn to men more than twice their age--men old enough to be their fathers--to give them the loving they need. Their daddies would freak out if they found out that their little darlings were sucking and fucking men as old as they are, but the truth is, these little darlings are just daddy's girls at heart.
title: Teen Bait
